thread.section_title: Saint Dominique Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect location for all your travel needs!
thread.title_full: Perfect location for all your travel needs! - Review of Saint Dominique Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: suzannerussell2017
title: Perfect location for all your travel needs!
text:
Lovely hotel within walking distance to many famous attractions, a variety of restaurants and shopping. Very clean and well kept; with many amenities to make your stay relaxing and enjoyable. The staff are very accommodating, and speak English well. I will be using this hotel any time I am in Paris!
Room Tip: Courtyard rooms are a bit larger and more elegant. See more room tips
